meanings.definition: To include or contain as part of a whole.
meanings.sent1: She is incorporating all the feedback into her project.
meanings.sent2: The recipe for the cake involves incorporating the eggs slowly.
meanings.sent3: By incorporating all the colors of the rainbow, the painting turned out vibrant.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were like incorporating different styles into a beautiful choreography.
meanings.sent5: Incorporating various spices into the dish made it burst with flavor.

meanings.sent1: The entrepreneurs are incorporating their business to expand.
meanings.sent2: They are incorporating their small company to protect their assets.
meanings.sent3: Incorporating the lemonade stand felt like starting a mini-empire.
meanings.sent4: Their teamwork was like incorporating different talents into a successful corporation.
meanings.sent5: The process of incorporating a company requires legal documentation.
